name: Jennifer Smith
subject: Wedding Planning
message: Hi, I'm planning a wedding for next summer and would like to discuss your wedding planning services. Could you please provide more information about your packages?

name: Tom Brown
subject: Corporate Event
message: We're organizing our annual company retreat and need catering services for 150 people. Could you send us a quote for a 3-day event?

response.content: Thank you for your inquiry. We'll prepare a detailed quote for your 3-day corporate retreat. Our team will contact you within 24 hours.

name: Anna Davis
subject: Birthday Party
message: Looking for birthday party planning for my daughter's 10th birthday. Theme: unicorn party with 30 kids. What are your rates?

response.content: Thank you for choosing Ideal Memory! We love unicorn themes! I'll send you our birthday party packages with pricing. Expect to hear from us soon!

name: Mark Johnson
subject: General Inquiry
message: Do you provide services for outdoor events? We're planning a garden party and wondering about weather contingency plans.

name: Sarah Wilson
subject: Quote Request
message: Hi, I need a quote for a wedding reception for 200 guests. Venue is already booked. Looking for complete catering and decoration services.

name: David Lee
subject: Complaint
message: I had an issue with the service at my event last week. The setup was delayed by 2 hours. This is unacceptable for the amount we paid.

name: Lisa Chen
subject: Event Decoration
message: I love your decoration work! Can you handle a vintage-themed anniversary party for 50 people? What's included in your decoration packages?

response.content: Thank you for your interest! We absolutely love vintage themes. I'll send you our decoration portfolio and package details for your anniversary party.

name: Robert Taylor
subject: Photography & Video
message: Do you provide photography and videography services? We need both for our wedding in June. What packages do you offer?
